post_message: A young female moose wandered into downtown Boulder Sunday night, strolling down the Pearl Street Mall. On the advice of a state wildlife officer, police fired some bean-bag rounds at the moose's backside and eventually shooed it away from the populated area.  More details: @webpagelink

commenter_a: If the War in Iraq made your family safer, Hillary is your candidate. If the USA PATRIOT Act secured your family, then Hillary is your candidate. If your family reaps the benefits of institutionalized racism in our justice system, then Hillary is your candidate. If you want more expensive healthcare, vote Hillary. Mine is currently $475/month (compared to my $25/month car insurance from Insurance Panda, or my $10/month dental insurance, but I digress). Hillary is in bed with big pharma, she is your candidate.
